attributes.action: Stop Government help for underage pregnant teenagers and their babies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The teenagers parents should be made to pay for all upkeep. This way getting pregnant will not be used as a get out clause for kids. Even if they still choose to have sex they will be a lot more careful. At the moment for any child with a bleak outlook, getting pregnant would be a very smart move indeed!
